content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been successfully established on the map. Although several attempts were made to supply and craft a Laboratory at (0.5, 2.5), none of these efforts resulted in a completed structure. All final reports confirm that no entities are present on the map.

ERROR TIPS
• API usage for entity retrieval – Calls to get_entities resulted in errors both when using an unsupported keyword (radius) and when passing positional arguments. Verify the function’s signature and use only the supported parameters.
• Iterating over entity results – Filtering operations on the output of get_entities caused a TypeError when a None value was returned. Always check that the returned value is a valid list before iterating.
• Structure placement – Attempts to place a Lab failed because no lab was available in the inventory. Confirm that all required items for placement are present before executing placement commands.
• Lab crafting prerequisites – Multiple lab crafting errors indicate missing sub-ingredients such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper-cables. Ensure that all necessary resources and intermediate products are secured and that resource conversion (e.g., smelting or crafting intermediary parts) is completed before attempting to craft a Lab.
